title: Singlet oxygen is not the main source of electrolyte degradation in lithium–oxygen batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02176B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Ceren Zor, Kieran D. Jones, Gregory J. Rees, Sixie Yang, Alexander Pateman, Xiangwen Gao, Lee R. Johnson, Peter G. Bruce
The lithium–oxygen field has focused on singlet oxygen’s role in cell degradation. This study shows no significant reaction between singlet oxygen and the electrolyte or carbon cathode, confirming it is not the major degradation source.
